subject: No Violence
text:
Two wicks in 
my earthen lamp. Love was 
sprayed on my wings.

The gender quote 
was inappropriate. You of 
you and me of me were one.

The door shuts for 
any god. The flowers 
speak of religion.

The evening song 
was a prayer. Name 
was on the lips.

Sea salt was 
piling up. You muffle 
my hair to awaken me.

No acknowledgments were needed.
